casebody.data:
Carrie Anne PINTAR, d/b/a Amazing Taxi, Michael Spreadbury, d/b/a Helena Town Car, Vance Vanderpan, d/b/a Greater Valley Taxi, Plaintiffs and Appellants,
v.
STATE of Montana, Montana Public Service Commission, Governor Steve Bullock, Travis Kavulla, Montana Department of Labor and Industry, Pam Bucy, Judy Bovington, Rasier-MT, LLC (Uber) Travis Kalanick, Defendants and Appellees. DA 18-0280 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: November 14, 2018
Decided: December 11, 2018

Affirmed.
